message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and the fact that it's worth $10000 to you, I propose we start our negotiation at a price of $9500. This allows us both to benefit from this transaction while ensuring you get a great deal on an item you value highly.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you acknowledging the value of the product to me. However, $9500 is still a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'm willing to pay $9000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a more attractive offer for both of us. Considering the value of the product to you and your budget constraints, I am willing to negotiate at a price of $9200. I believe this strikes a good balance between fairness and profitability for us both.
